Name: id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: account
Description: Details regarding the account.

Name: account.id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: account.link
Description: The `link.id` the data belongs to.

Name: account.institution
Description: Details regarding the institution.

Name: account.institution.name
Description: The name of the institution, as designated by Belvo. Please see our Institutions DevPortal article for a detailed list of institution names.

Name: account.institution.type
Description:
The type of institution. We return one of the following values:

  - `bank`
  - `fiscal`
  - `employment`

Name: account.collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: account.created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: account.last_accessed_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of Belvo's most recent successful access to the institution for the given link.

Name: account.category
Description:
The type of account.
We return one of the following enum values:
  - `ADVANCE_DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT`
  - `CHECKING_ACCOUNT`
  - `CREDIT_CARD`
  - `FINANCING_ACCOUNT`
  - `INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT`
  - `INVOICE_FINANCING_ACCOUNT`
  - `LOAN_ACCOUNT`
  - `PENSION_FUND_ACCOUNT`
  - `SAVINGS_ACCOUNT`
  - `UNCATEGORIZED`
Enum: ADVANCE_DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT, CHECKING_ACCOUNT, CREDIT_CARD, FINANCING_ACCOUNT, INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_FINANCING_ACCOUNT, LOAN_ACCOUNT, PENSION_FUND_ACCOUNT, SAVINGS_ACCOUNT, UNCATEGORIZED

Name: account.balance_type
Description: Indicates whether this account is either an `ASSET` or a `LIABILITY`. You can consider the balance of an `ASSET` as being positive, while the balance of a `LIABILITY` as negative.

Name: account.overdraft.arranged
Description:
The agreed upon overdraft limit between the account holder and the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `overdraft` field is available.

Name: account.overdraft.used
Description:
The overdraft value used.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `overdraft` field is available.

Name: account.overdraft.unarranged
Description:
The overdraft used that was not arranged between the account holder and the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `overdraft` field is available.

Name: account.type
Description:
The account type, as designated by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.subtype
Description:
The account subtype, as designated by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.name
Description: The account name, as given by the institution.

Name: account.number
Description: The account number, as designated by the institution.

Name: account.agency
Description: The branch code where the product was opened.

Name: account.check_digit
Description: The check digit of the product's number, if applicable.

Name: account.balance
Description: Details regarding the current and available balances for the account.

Name: account.balance.current
Description:
The current balance is calculated differently according to the type of account.


- **ðŸ’° Checking and saving accounts**:


The user's account balance at the `collected_at` timestamp.

- **ðŸ’³ Credit cards**:


The amount the user has spent in the current card billing period (see `credit_data.cutting_date` for information on when the current billing period finishes).

- **ðŸ¡ Loan accounts**:


The amount remaining to pay on the users's loan.

Name: account.balance.available
Description:
The balance that the account owner can use.

- **ðŸ’° Checking and saving accounts**:


The available balance may be different to the `current` balance due to pending transactions.

- **ðŸ’³ Credit cards**:


The credit amount the user still has available for the current period. The amount is calculated as `credit_data.credit_limit` minus `balance.current`.

- **ðŸ¡ Loan accounts**:


The present value required to pay off the loan, as provided by the institution.


**Note:** If the institution does not provide this value, we return `null`.

Name: account.balance.blocked
Description:
The amount that is currently blocked due to pending transactions.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `balances` field is available.

Name: account.balance.automatically_invested
Description:
The amount that is automatically invested (as agreed upon with the institution).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `balances` field is available.

Name: account.currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `balances` field is available.

Name: account.public_identification_name
Description: The public name for the type of identification. For ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· Brazilian savings and checking accounts, this field will be `AGENCY/ACCOUNT`.

Name: account.public_identification_value
Description:
The value for the `public_identification_name`.

For ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· OFDA Brazilian savings and checking accounts, this field will be the agency and bank account number, separated by a slash. For example: `0444/45722-0`.

For ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· OFDA Brazilian credit card accounts, we will return a string of concatenated credit card numbers associated with the account. For example: "8763,9076,5522"

Name: account.internal_identification
Description:
The institution's internal identification for the account.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `balances` field is available.

Name: account.credit_data
Description: Details regarding the credit cards associated with this account.

Name: account.credit_data.collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: account.credit_data.credit_limit
Description:
The upper credit limit of the card.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].identification_number
Description:
The credit card number.

**Note:** Often, this is just the last four digit of the credit card.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].credit_limit
Description: The limit of the credit card.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].used_amount
Description: The amount used.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].available_amount
Description:
The amount still available.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].is_limit_flexible
Description:
Boolean to indicate if the `credit_limit` is flexible.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].type
Description:
The type of limit. We return one of the following values:

  - `TOTAL_LIMIT`
  - `MODAL_LIMIT`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].consolidation_type
Description:
Indicates whether or not the credit limit is consolidated or individual.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].line_name
Description: The credit limit line name.

Name: account.credit_data.limits[].line_name_additional_info
Description: Additional information about the line name.

Name: account.credit_data.cutting_date
Description: The date when the credit card's bill is due.

Name: account.credit_data.minimum_payment
Description: The minimum amount that the account owner needs to pay in the current credit period.

Name: account.credit_data.network
Description:
The credit network that the card is associated with. We return one of the following values:

  - `VISA`
  - `MASTERCARD`
  - `AMERICAN_EXPRESS`
  - `DINERS_CLUB`
  - `HIPERCARD`
  - `BANDEIRA_PROPRIA`
  - `CHEQUE_ELETRONICO`
  - `ELO`
  - `OTHER`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.
Enum: VISA, MASTERCARD, AMERICAN_EXPRESS, DINERS_CLUB, HIPERCARD, BANDEIRA_PROPRIA, CHEQUE_ELETRONICO, ELO, OTHER

Name: account.credit_data.network_additional_info
Description: Additional information about the credit card network.

Name: account.credit_data.cards
Description: Details regarding the cards associated with the account.

Name: account.credit_data.cards[].is_multiple
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this account has multiple credit cards.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.cards[].identification_number
Description:
The credit card number.

**Note:** Often, this is just the last four digit of the credit card.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.credit_data.next_payment_date
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.credit_data.no_interest_payment
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.credit_data.interest_rate
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.credit_data.monthly_payment
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.credit_data.last_payment_date
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data
Description: The loan options associated with this account.

Name: account.loan_data.collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: account.loan_data.loan_code
Description:
The country-specific standardized contract number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.contract_amount
Description: The initial total loan amount when the contract was signed, calculated by the institution. This amount includes the principal + interest + taxes + fees.

Name: account.loan_data.total_effective_cost
Description: The initial total effective cost of the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.loan_type
Description:
The type of the loan, according to the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.outstanding_balance
Description: The amount remaining to pay in total, including interest.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates
Description:
Breakdown of the interest applied to the loan. With OF Brazil, we highly recommend using the information in `interest_rate_data` for in-depth information.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].name
Description:
The name of the type of interest rate applied to the loan.

**Note:** For OFDA Brazil, we recommend you use the `interest_date_data.tax_type` parameter.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].type
Description:
The period that the interest is applied to the loan.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].value
Description:
The interest rate (in percent or currency value).

**Note:** For OFDA Brazil, we recommend you use the `interest_date_data.pre_fixed_rate` and `interest_date_data.post_fixed_rate`parameter.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data
Description: Detailed information regarding the interest rate.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.tax_type
Description:
The type of interest rate tax. We return one of the following values:

  - `NOMINAL`
  - `EFFECTIVE`
  
  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.rate_type
Description:
The type of interest rate. We return one of the following values:

  - `SIMPLE`
  - `COMPOUND`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.type
Description:
The period that the interest is applied to the loan.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.calculation_base
Description:
The base calculation for the interest rate.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.reference_index_type
Description:
The reference index rate. We return one of the following values:

  - `WITHOUT_INDEX_TYPE`
  - `PRE_FIXED`
  - `POST_FIXED`
  - `FLOATING`
  - `INDEXED_PRICE`
  - `RURAL_CREDIT`
  - `OTHER_INDEX`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.
Enum: WITHOUT_INDEX_TYPE, PRE_FIXED, POST_FIXED, FLOATING, INDEXED_PRICE, RURAL_CREDIT, OTHER_INDEX

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.reference_index_subtype
Description: The subtype of the reference index rate.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.reference_index_info
Description: Additional information regarding the reference index rate.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.pre_fixed_rate
Description:
The pre-fixed percentage rate of the interest rate.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.post_fixed_rate
Description:
The post-fixed percentage rate of the interest rate.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rates[].interest_rate_data.additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the interest rate.

Name: account.loan_data.fees
Description: Breakdown of the fees applied to the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].type
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].value
Description: The total value of the fee. Same currency as the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].name
Description:
The fee name.

 > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `fees` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].code
Description:
The fee code.

 > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `fees` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].fee_charge_type
Description:
Indicates the type of charge. We return one of the following values:

  - `SINGLE`
  - `PER_INSTALLMENT`

   > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `fees` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].fee_charge
Description:
Billing method, as agreed upon with the institution. We return one of the following values:

  - `MINIMUM`
  - `MAXIMUM`
  - `FIXED`
  - `PERCENTAGE`

   > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `fees` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.fees[].rate
Description: The percentage rate of the fee. Required when `fee_charge` is set to `PERCENTAGE`.

Name: account.loan_data.contracted_charges[].type
Description:
The type of contracted charge. We return one of the following values:

  - `LATE_PAYMENT_INTEREST_FEE`
  - `LATE_PAYMENT_PENALTY_FEE`
  - `DEFAULT_INTEREST_FEE`
  - `LOAN_CONTRACT_TAX`
  - `LATE_PAYMENT_TAX`
  - `NO_CHARGE`
  - `OTHER`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `contracted_charges` field is available.
Enum: LATE_PAYMENT_INTEREST_FEE, LATE_PAYMENT_PENALTY_FEE, DEFAULT_INTEREST_FEE, LOAN_CONTRACT_TAX, LATE_PAYMENT_TAX, NO_CHARGE, OTHER

Name: account.loan_data.contracted_charges[].info
Description: Additional information regarding the contracted charge.

Name: account.loan_data.contracted_charges[].rate
Description: The percentage rate of the charge, calculated based on the amount of the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.collaterals
Description: Details regarding any loan collaterals that the individual or business supplied.

Name: account.loan_data.collaterals[].type
Description:
The type of collateral, as defined by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `collaterals` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.collaterals[].subtype
Description:
The subtype of the collateral, as defined by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `collaterals` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.collaterals[].currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `collaterals` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.collaterals[].amount
Description:
The total amount of the bill.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `collaterals` field is available.

Name: account.loan_data.balloon_payments
Description: Detailed information regarding any balloon payments for the loan, if applicable.

Name: account.loan_data.balloon_payments[].due_date
Description: The date that the balloon payment is to be paid, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: account.loan_data.balloon_payments[].currency
Description: The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

Name: account.loan_data.balloon_payments[].amount
Description: The total amount of the balloon payment.

Name: account.loan_data.installments_contract_term_frequency
Description:
The frequency of contracted installment payments, as defined when the contract was first signed. We return one of the following:

  - `DAY`
  - `WEEK`
  - `MONTH`
  - `YEAR`
  - `NO_DEADLINE_REMAINING`
  - `null`
Enum: DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR, NO_DEADLINE_REMAINING, None

Name: account.loan_data.installment_frequency
Description:
The frequency that the installments are paid. We return one of the following values:

  - `IRREGULAR`
  - `WEEKLY`
  - `FORTNIGHTLY`
  - `MONTHLY`
  - `BIMONTHLY`
  - `QUARTERLY`
  - `BIANNUALLY`
  - `ANNUALLY`
  - `OTHER`

  > **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.
Enum: IRREGULAR, WEEKLY, FORTNIGHTLY, MONTHLY, BIMONTHLY, QUARTERLY, BIANNUALLY, ANNUALLY, OTHER

Name: account.loan_data.installment_frequency_info
Description: Additional information regarding the `installment_frequency`.
Example: Both the term and requency are the same.

Name: account.loan_data.first_installment_due_date
Description: The date when the first installment of the loan is to be paid, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: account.loan_data.number_of_installments_total
Description: The total number of installments required to pay the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.number_of_installments_outstanding
Description: The number of installments left to pay.

Name: account.loan_data.number_of_installments_paid
Description: The number of installments already paid.

Name: account.loan_data.number_of_installments_past_due
Description: The number of installments that are overdue.

Name: account.loan_data.disbursement_dates
Description: An array of dates when the loan was disbursed.

Name: account.loan_data.settlement_date
Description: The date that the loan was settled, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: account.loan_data.contract_start_date
Description:
The date when the loan contract was signed, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.contract_end_date
Description: The date when the loan is expected to be completed, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: account.loan_data.contract_remaining_frequency
Description:
The frequency of the remaining contracted installment payments, as defined when the contract was first signed. We return one of the following:
- `DAY`
- `WEEK`
- `MONTH`
- `YEAR`
- `NO_DEADLINE_REMAINING`
- `null`
Enum: DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR, NO_DEADLINE_REMAINING, None

Name: account.loan_data.contract_remaining_total
Description: The total number of installments remaining on the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.amortization_schedule
Description:
The loan amortization schedule.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: account.loan_data.amortization_schedule_info
Description: Additional information regarding the `amortization_schedule`.

Name: account.loan_data.consignee_id
Description: The ID of the consignee of the loan.

Name: account.loan_data.contract_number
Description: The contract number of the loan, as given by the institution.

Name: account.loan_data.monthly_payment
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.principal
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.payment_day
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.outstanding_principal
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.credit_limit
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.last_period_balance
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.interest_rate
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.limit_day
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.cutting_day
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.cutting_date
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.last_payment_date
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.loan_data.no_interest_payment
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: account.funds_data
Description: **Note:** This field is not applicable for OF Brazil and will return null.

Name: internal_identification
Description: The institution's internal identifier for the bill.

Name: bill_name
Description:
The title of the monthly credit card bill the transaction belongs to. The format of the returned value is institution specific, however, some common examples are:

- diciembre-2021
- dec-2021
- dec-21

> **Note**: This field is only returned for 'closed' bills (meaning the billing period has ended and the bill has been emitted). If the billing period is still ongoing, we return `null`.

Name: due_date
Description: The date that the bill is to be paid, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: currency
Description: The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

Name: total_amount
Description: The total amount of the bill.

Name: minimum_amount
Description: The minimum amount to pay.

Name: is_installment
Description: Boolean to indicate whether this bill can be paid in installments.

Name: finance_charges[].type
Description:
The type of finance charge applied to the bill. We return one of the following values:

  - `LATE_PAYMENT_INTEREST`
  - `LATE_FEE`
  - `ARREARS_INTEREST`
  - `IOF`
  - `NO_CHARGE`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`
Enum: LATE_PAYMENT_INTEREST, LATE_FEE, ARREARS_INTEREST, IOF, NO_CHARGE, OTHER, None

Name: finance_charges[].additional_info
Description: Additional information about the finance charge.

Name: finance_charges[].currency
Description: The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

Name: finance_charges[].amount
Description: The amount of the finance charge.

Name: payments[].type
Description:
The type of payment. We return one of the following values:

  - `INSTALLMENT`
  - `FULL`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`

Name: payments[].payment_date
Description: The date that the payment was made, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: payments[].payment_mode
Description:
The method in which the payment was made. We return one of the following values:

  - `DIRECT_DEBIT`
  - `BANK_SLIP`
  - `SALARY_DEDUCTION`
  - `PIX`
  - `null`

Name: payments[].currency
Description: The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

Name: payments[].amount
Description: The amount of the payment.
